name: AudioBalanceFadeType
desc: Identifiers for audio balance fade types.

items.name: case equalPower
items.desc: Overall loudness remains constant, but gain can exceed 1.0. The gain value is 1.0 when the balance and fade are in the center. From there they can increase to +3dB (1.414) and decrease to silence.

items.name: case maxUnityGain
items.desc: Ensures that the overall gain value never exceeds 1.0 by fading one channel as the other channelâ€™s level rises. This can reduce overall loudness when the balance or fade is not in the center.
